//anmolarora123
//http://www.codechef.com/problems/CW04
#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#define f(i,a,n) for(int i=a;i<n;i++)
#define ll long long
#define si(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define sl(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define ss(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pi(a) printf("%d\n",a)
#define pl(a) printf("%lld\n",a)
using namespace std;
char s[100005],branch[100005];
int l;
int vis[100005]={0};
void dfs(int level)
{
if(level>=l-1)
{
branch[l]=0;
printf("%s\n",branch);
return;
}

f(i,0,l)
{
if(vis[i]==0)
{
vis[i]=1;
branch[++level]=s[i];

dfs(level);
vis[i]=0;
level--;
}
}

}

int main()
{

ss(s);
l=strlen(s);

dfs(-1);


        //system("Pause");
	return 0;
}
